Text: Re Pending Reg Switch Option Deals Cc From the short term my belief is in the current deregulation environment that we only do physical service I think Standard Offer Service will be changing a lot as states work through deregulation issues Jay Rogers CT AM To Sean A ES James B NRON James W ES Jeremy ES cc Kevin M CT John J nronXGate Don ES Subject Pending Reg Switch Option Deals Everyone Are there any Reg Switch Option Deals currently in the pipeline Specifically I mean deals whereby we offer a near term index that goes away either date certain or upon dereg date and switches to an Index plus adder The assumption historically being that we offset the near term discount by purcahsing standard offer service post dereg which is valued lower than index adder On a broader note do we have ANY deals coming down the pipe that are predicated on us receiving the benefit of Standard Offer Service date certain or otherwise Jay can you come up with a game plan for identifying our potential current MTMPL exposure relating to date certain dereg and standard offer assumptions Thanks Rogers
